title: The billionaire of Africa will give $1 million to anyone who wants to leave America if Donald Trump is elected president.
subtitle: The false news sites argue that Femi Adenogami is offering a large amount of money to African Americans who wish to leave the United States because of Donald Trump's election.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A billionaire from South Africa offers a large amount of money to African Americans who leave the country because of Trump's election.
